title: dharaNige doreyendu
sahitya:
dharaNige doreyendu nambide intha parama lObhiyembudariye shrI hariye


caraNam 1    kADi bEDuvarige koDalArade anji Odi nIroLu sEri koNDe bEga 
hEDiya teradali moreya tOrate Odi araNyadi mrgagaLa sErde
    caraNam 2    baDavara bhinnaha lAlisade halla kaDu kOpadali teradanjiside 
taDeyade bhikSuganAdare biDarendu koDaliya piDidu kODagahiNDa kAide
    caraNam 3    uttamanendare matte cOranAde battale ninte tEjiyaEride 
etta hOdaru biDe matte ninnanu dEva cittaja janaka shrI purandara viTTala
